newsitem.title: TAIWAN: DIARY - Taiwan IPO share offerings - Jan 6.
newsitem.headline: DIARY - Taiwan IPO share offerings - Jan 6.

text.p: The following are planned initial public share offerings in Taiwan. To include items, telephone the Reuters editorial bureau in Taipei on (886-2) 508-0815 or fax items to (886-2) 508-0204.
* denotes Securities and Exchange Commission approval
Company Shares Price Expected Lead manager
(Full name is Sheng Yu Steel Co Ltd, a maker of cold-rolled steel and galvanized steel)
(De Licacy Industrial Co Ltd is a textile firm)
(Les Enphants Co Ltd makes products for babies and children)
(Must Systems Inc is an image scanner maker)
Ho Tai Motor* 56.028 52.5 Dec 27/Feb 25 Concord Sec
(Ho Tai Motor Co Ltd is a car distributor)
(President Chain Store Corp is Taiwan's 7-ELEVEN convenience store chain)
